column4: find out where your existing plugins are, and install it in the same directory
most are in /usr/lib/rhythmbox/plugins - as i already mentioned, this doesn't work
check your file permissions plugins dir, use the same for your plugin. also try checking version compatibility with rhythmbox. can't think of anything else.
meh. it really seems to be an old plugin. i wonder why even starting rhythmbox with -d did not mention that.
